name: aeroflow
description: Truly lazily computed reactive data flows with rich set of pure functional operators and async support.
keywords: ES6, fluent, async, reactive, functional, FRP, LINQ
author: Denis Vlassenko <denis_vlassenko@epam.com>

scripts.all: npm run validate && npm run build && npm run test && npm run document
scripts.build: npm run concatenate && npm run transpile && npm run minify
scripts.build:library: npm run concatenate:library && npm run concatenate:library:modern && npm run transpile:library && npm run minify
scripts.build:tests: npm run concatenate:tests && npm run concatenate:tests:modern && npm run transpile:tests
scripts.concatenate: npm run concatenate:library && npm run concatenate:library:modern && npm run concatenate:tests && npm run concatenate:tests:modern
scripts.document: npm run document:library && npm run document:tests
scripts.document:library: jsdoc2md source/aeroflow.js > documentation/readme.md --global-index-format dl --member-index-format grouped --module-index-format grouped --param-list-format list --property-list-format list --sort-by name
scripts.test: npm run test:library && npm run test:coverage
scripts.transpile: npm run transpile:library && npm run transpile:tests
scripts.validate: npm run validate:library && npm run validate:tests
